name: script

scripts.start:
echo "Follow the steps in readme.md
Use gen-hcce for generating your kubernetes config file, apply to update your cluster, get-ip to get the load balancer IP address, and gen-ssl for adding ssl certificates
To see options, use 'npm run gen-hcce -- --help' and so forth." && exit 1

description: scripts to set up and configure Hubs Cloud Community Edition
